articles.author: Sam Blewett
articles.title: Trump’s trade war has India hugging Britain close - politico.eu
articles.description: The U.S. president’s second stint in office is   binding the two countries together — and prompting London to look the other way on contentious issues.
articles.content: Later came Rishi Sunak, particularly revered in India for becoming the first prime minister of Indian descent to lead the former colonial power. Despite that, he never held much hope for striking a d… [+1704 chars]
